text: i joined the italian aws team in 2016.
it was in full startup mode and it
seemed to me like the most
exciting place to build learn and have
fun
in the last four years i've had the
chance to work with all kinds of
customers
from new startups to large enterprises
today
i'm a sales manager at aws my team
helps our customers to find the best
solutions to deliver their services
in the fastest most secure and
cost-effective way
i am a proud part of the women at aws
italy group the group was created to
improve diversity in a tech environment
like ours we work closely with
universities
that have a similar goal outside of work
i have two children i require a lot of
flexibility in my role
i feel lucky i work at a company where
that is possible
the piece of which everything moves at
aws
is very exciting and our scope is a lot
broader
than our job title
